title: Do you think that in the future, Catholicism will lose weight in society and in the formal educational system? - Quora

response.answer_text: It lost that a long time ago… never really had it. But I think it will always play a role in the sense of the things only it has that no one else does. The things that are specifically catholic. I think now that Catholics can educate themselves from their homes is a big one that’s going to lead to some kind of a revival amongst people that come come from the background the fought for it to be here today … I think the belief of intercession of saints is absolutely crucial to hope and spiritual understanding as people just like me and you act on our behalf from the afterlife and that’s a really important thing for the west to grasp that death is a lie. Purgatory , when you wake up dead. It’s good to know in advance that it was going to happen rather than let demons tell you you’re insane. Do you want blessings out of life? Follow the religion. Do you want society to collapse? No? Then follow your religion. Will I? No not likely, will I repent, yes. Will I repent because the alternative is lack of grace and potential destruction? Pretty much
